actor_awards.notes: Known as one of the last stars of the Golden Age of Hollywood musicals.

filmography.title: Song of the Open Road
filmography.role_description: A juvenile movie star who runs away from the studio to join the Youth Hostel movement and pick crops; Powell's film debut.
filmography.plot: A child star rebels against her controlling schedule and runs away to join a group of young crop pickers.

filmography.title: Delightfully Dangerous
filmography.role_description: A young music student who discovers her sister is a burlesque performer rather than a Broadway star.
filmography.plot: A teenager studying music tries to help her sister, whom she believes is a Broadway star but is actually a burlesque dancer.

filmography.title: Holiday in Mexico
filmography.role_description: The teenage daughter of the US Ambassador to Mexico who falls for a pianist while trying to manage her father's social life.
filmography.plot: The daughter of an ambassador tries to run her father's household while navigating her own romantic entanglements in Mexico City.

filmography.title: Three Daring Daughters
filmography.role_description: The eldest of three sisters who try to bring their divorced mother back together with their father, only to find she has remarried.
filmography.plot: Three daughters scheme to reunite their divorced parents, unaware that their mother has already secretly married a pianist.

filmography.title: A Date with Judy
filmography.role_description: A spirited teenager who competes with a snobbish rival for a boy's affection; features the song 'It's a Most Unusual Day'.
filmography.plot: Two teenagers compete for the same boy and try to solve a potential family scandal involving a rumba dancer.

filmography.title: Luxury Liner
filmography.role_description: A teenager who stows away on a cruise ship to be with her father, the captain, and proves her singing talent.
filmography.plot: The daughter of a ship captain stows away on his luxury liner to convince him she is ready for a singing career.

filmography.title: Nancy Goes to Rio
filmography.role_description: The daughter of an actress who competes with her mother for the same role and the same man.
filmography.plot: A mother and daughter, both actresses, travel to Rio and unknowingly compete for the same leading role.

filmography.title: Two Weeks with Love
filmography.role_description: A young girl on a family vacation in the Catskills who tries to prove she is grown up; features the hit duet 'Aba Daba Honeymoon'.
filmography.plot: In the early 1900s, a teenager on vacation tries to woo a handsome older man while dealing with her parents' restrictions.

filmography.title: Royal Wedding
filmography.role_description: A Broadway performer who travels to London with her brother (Fred Astaire) and falls for a British aristocrat.
filmography.plot: A brother and sister dance act encounter challenges and romance when they take their show to London during the Royal Wedding.

filmography.title: Rich, Young and Pretty
filmography.role_description: A wealthy Texan girl visiting Paris who meets her estranged mother, a nightclub singer.
filmography.plot: A young woman goes to Paris with her father and meets her long-lost mother, discovering romance along the way.

filmography.title: Small Town Girl
filmography.role_description: A small-town girl who falls for a rich playboy arrested for speeding in her town.
filmography.plot: A judge's daughter falls for a wealthy playboy who has been sentenced to 30 days in the local jail.

filmography.title: Three Sailors and a Girl
filmography.role_description: A Broadway star who helps three sailors invest their ship's savings in a musical show.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on leave in New York invest their submarine's surplus funds in a Broadway musical.

filmography.title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
filmography.role_description: A spirited cook who marries a backwoodsman and takes on the task of civilizing his six unruly brothers.
filmography.plot: When the eldest of seven brothers living on the frontier brings home a bride, she attempts to civilize his six rowdy siblings.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Musical Score; National Film Registry (Inducted 2004)

filmography.title: Athena
filmography.role_description: One of seven sisters in a family of health-conscious, numerology-obsessed eccentrics.
filmography.plot: A conservative lawyer falls in love with one of seven sisters from an eccentric, health-nut family.

filmography.title: Deep in My Heart
filmography.role_description: Powell appears in the 'Maytime' segment, singing 'Will You Remember' in this biopic of Sigmund Romberg.
filmography.plot: A biography of the Hungarian-born composer Sigmund Romberg, featuring cameos by many MGM stars.

filmography.title: Hit the Deck
filmography.role_description: A singer who becomes the romantic interest of one of three sailors on leave in San Francisco.
filmography.plot: Three sailors on shore leave in San Francisco find romance and complications with three different women.

filmography.title: The Girl Most Likely
filmography.role_description: A girl who wants to marry a rich man but finds herself torn between three diverse suitors.
filmography.plot: A young woman who believes she is destined to marry a millionaire must choose between a mechanic, a realtor, and a rich playboy.
filmography.awards: Musical Remake of 'Tom, Dick and Harry'

filmography.title: The Female Animal
filmography.role_description: The daughter of an alcoholic movie star who competes with her mother for the love of a handsome extra.
filmography.plot: A movie star is saved from an accident by an extra, leading to a romance that is complicated by her daughter's interest in him.

filmography.title: Enchanted Island
filmography.role_description: A Polynesian woman who falls in love with a runaway sailor in this adaptation of Melville's 'Typee'.
filmography.plot: Two 19th-century sailors jump ship and find themselves on an island inhabited by cannibals.

filmography.title: Ruggles of Red Gap
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a rancher in this television musical adaptation of the classic comedy.
filmography.plot: A refined English valet is won in a poker game by a rough-and-tumble American rancher and brought to the Wild West.

filmography.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
filmography.role_description: The lead role of Esther in this television remake of the classic Judy Garland musical.
filmography.plot: In the year leading up to the 1904 World's Fair, a St. Louis family navigates life and love.

filmography.title: Sandy the Seal
filmography.role_description: A lighthouse keeper's wife who helps her children care for an injured seal.
filmography.plot: A seal injured by poachers is rescued by two children and their parents, who nurse it back to health.

filmography.title: Mayday at 40,000 Feet!
filmography.role_description: A passenger on a perilously damaged airliner in this television disaster movie.
filmography.plot: A desperate criminal goes on a shooting rampage aboard a flight, wounding the pilot and damaging the plane's hydraulics.

filmography.title: Marie
filmography.role_description: A singer and teacher; a supporting role in this biographical drama starring Sissy Spacek.
filmography.plot: The true story of Marie Ragghianti, a parole board head who exposes corruption in the Tennessee governor's office.

filmography.title: The Oldest Living Bridesmaid
filmography.role_description: A career woman who falls for a younger man, dealing with societal expectations and romance later in life.
filmography.plot: A dedicated career woman finds unexpected romance with her new, younger secretary.
